I deleted the works that we aren't writing about...it seemed to make sense especially if they'll still be listed on the David Foster Wallace page. lrose 21:50, 29 April 2009 (PDT)

Do you think we should just take off the works page from the bio? Erinlikescupcakes 21:51, 29 April 2009 (PDT)

Yes, but keep a link to the works page--emrad 22:09, 29 April 2009 (PDT)

I think we ought to take it off. To be honest, it might just be best to have the Works Page and the Themes Page get subsumed by the DFW page, and do what the Marx people did and have the main page just say "To start, here's DFW!" Ryan 23:52, 29 April 2009 (PDT)

Any commentary about why the page has been changed should be kept here Rudy 23:16, 5 May 2009 (PDT)

I added an unpublished / uncompiled works list like Fitzpatrick suggested, but basically had to copy it all from the Howling Fantods thing. I just figured it would be nice to have on our page so you didnt have to go out of our site to find it.

all the links lead to 404 errors! maybe we should unlink the pages. Cgf02007 21:51, 7 May 2009 (PDT)

DANGGG i worked for soooo long to do the linking :( i think it's because you can only link from howling fantods... Erinlikescupcakes 11:58, 8 May 2009 (PDT)

OO got it working, but the links will be numbers right before titles.
